name: Live with Mary
description:
"Live with Mary" is a game where you play as a young man who is assigned to take care of his older sister's home. At the same time, a beautiful girl who seems to have some connection with his sister comes to stay with him. Her name is Mary.



This game is a 3D third-person exploration game where player can control a character to explore scenes and there is a 3D animated storyline with English voice-over.

Feature

You will develop a relationship with Mary by talking, buying gifts, cooking, and participating in various activities with her to improve your relationship level.

1. Exploring the house and collect some items
2. Cooking dinner for Mary
3. Playing mini games jigsaw puzzles to earn money to buy items.
4. Buy Mary some suitable gifts.
5. The gallery system collects pictures and videos that the player has found in the game.




The game will have multiple endings for you to discover, including an ending that you can expect with certainty. It all depends on your actions.
